case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Brandon L. Davis

opinions.opinion_text:
Appeal from a judgment of the Monroe County Court (John R. Schwartz, A.J.), rendered March 12, 2007. The judgment convicted defendant, upon his plea of guilty, of attempted robbery in the second degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from is unanimously affirmed. Present—Scudder, P.J., Martoche, Peradotto, Green and Gorski, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
